panels.visual: Lunara straining, pushing harder Sweat on her brow despite cold
panels.dialogue: Lunara: "No... something's wrong with the Essence!"

characters.Lunara: High elf druid, Circle of the Moon. 5'8" tall, graceful lithe athletic build. Long flowing chestnut brown hair with flowers woven in. Vibrant green eyes reflecting forest depths. Fair skin with slight tan. Classical elven beauty, pointed ears, serene expression. Practical druid robes in earthy greens and browns. Living vines and small flowers woven into clothing. Wooden staff carved with natural patterns. Bare feet or simple leather sandals.

panels.prompt:
Professional comic book panel illustration.

Location: Grand Courtyard of Everpeak Citadel during Yule Tree ceremony. Winter day.

Characters:
- Lunara: High elf druid, 5'8", graceful athletic build, long flowing chestnut brown hair (now disheveled from exertion) with flowers woven in, vibrant green eyes wide with concern and glowing with magic, fair skin with slight tan, pointed ears, expression showing strain and worry, practical druid robes in earthy greens and browns, living vines and flowers woven into clothing, wooden staff gripped tightly

Scene: Medium shot of Lunara showing physical and magical strain. Body language shows her pushing harder with the spell - arms extended forward, hands crackling with intensifying green nature magic, body leaning forward with effort. Sweat visibly beading on her forehead and running down her face despite the winter cold. Hair whipping from magical wind. Expression showing concern, confusion, and determination. She's fighting against the resistance but something is clearly wrong. Green energy spiraling more intensely around her. Verdant Mephit visible blurred in background still causing chaos. Tree struggling behind her.

Dialogue: Lunara: "No... something's wrong with the Essence!"

Include speech bubble with dialogue text clearly readable.

Style: Bold ink line art, vibrant colors, dynamic composition, sequential art style, graphic novel quality. Show strain and effort through body language and magical effects.

panels.visual: Tree finally settling into place, but wobbling Essence dissipating into air angrily Relieved but confused crowd **Sound EFFECTS:** "THUD"
panels.dialogue: Crowd member: "That's never happened before..." Val (to Lunara): "Are you alright? What WAS that?"

characters.Lunara: High elf druid, Circle of the Moon. 5'8" tall, graceful lithe athletic build. Long flowing chestnut brown hair with flowers woven in. Vibrant green eyes reflecting forest depths. Fair skin with slight tan. Classical elven beauty, pointed ears, serene expression. Practical druid robes in earthy greens and browns. Living vines and small flowers woven into clothing. Wooden staff carved with natural patterns. Bare feet or simple leather sandals.
characters.Val: Brass dragonborn monk, early 20s appearance. Just under 7 feet tall, lean athletic build with wiry monk strength. Warm brass/copper-bronze scales with metallic sheen. Ember-glow orange eyes, bright and expressive. Reptilian face with kind open expression, shorter snout. Simple monastery robes in earth tones (browns, tans) with chalk dust marks. Bare clawed feet. Prayer beads around wrist. Always in motion, expressive hand gestures.

npcs.Fantasy Crowd: Diverse medieval fantasy crowd showing mixed relief and confusion - high elves in elegant robes with worried expressions, stout dwarves in heavy furs whispering to each other, humans in colorful medieval festival clothing looking concerned, halflings in practical traveling clothes pointing and talking, dragonborn in ceremonial fantasy garb with uncertain faces. All medieval fantasy attire.

panels.prompt:
Professional comic book panel illustration.

Location: Grand Courtyard of Everpeak Citadel after the Yule Tree ceremony incident. Winter day with festival decorations.

Characters:
- Lunara (left/center, exhausted): High elf druid, 5'8", graceful athletic build, long flowing chestnut brown hair disheveled with flowers woven in, vibrant green eyes showing exhaustion, fair skin with sweat, pointed ears, expression showing relief mixed with concern, practical druid robes in earthy greens and browns, living vines and flowers woven into clothing, wooden staff, bare feet, breathing heavily
- Val (approaching Lunara with concern): Brass dragonborn monk, just under 7 feet, lean athletic build, warm brass/copper-bronze scales with metallic sheen, ember-glow orange eyes showing worry, kind reptilian expression, simple earth-tone monastery robes with chalk dust, bare clawed feet, prayer beads on wrist, hand reaching toward Lunara in concern

Crowd/NPCs: Medieval fantasy crowd in background showing relief mixed with confusion - high elves in elegant robes with worried expressions whispering, stout dwarves in heavy furs and chainmail discussing among themselves, humans in colorful medieval festival clothing looking concerned and confused, halflings in practical traveling clothes pointing and talking, dragonborn in ceremonial fantasy garb with uncertain faces. All medieval fantasy attire.

Scene: Wide establishing shot showing aftermath of the ceremony. The massive Yule Tree has finally settled into place in the center of the courtyard ritual space, but it's visibly wobbling and unstable - tilting slightly, roots not fully settled. The corrupted Verdant Essence (green angry magical energy) is dissipating up into the air, breaking apart into wisps and particles that fade away. Crowd surrounds the scene at a respectful distance, showing mixed emotions - relief that it's over but confusion and concern about what just happened. Val moving through crowd toward exhausted Lunara. Winter setting with snow, festival decorations, white stone courtyard. Crystalline citadel spires visible in background.

Dialogue: 
- Crowd member (from crowd): "That's never happened before..."
- Val (to Lunara, concerned): "Are you alright? What WAS that?"

Sound Effects: Large bold "THUD" showing the tree's heavy final settling.

Include speech bubbles with dialogue text clearly readable.

Style: Bold ink line art, vibrant colors, dynamic composition, sequential art style, graphic novel quality. Wide cinematic panel showing full scope of scene and aftermath.
